types:type.name: player
playerOutput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type playerOutput = {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, firstName: String, lastName: String, teamId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, team: String |} {"example": "{\\\"id\\\":21,\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"Andriyyyy\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Shevchenko\\\",\\\"teamId\\\":1,\\\"team\\\":\\\"nesto\\\"}"}

types:type.name: playerUpdate
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type playerUpdate = {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, firstName: String, lastName: String, teamId: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"id\\\":23,\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"Andrija\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Shevchenko\\\",\\\"teamId\\\":1}"}
